MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Happy Halloween!
Greetings exchanged here and there in the streets, just for now. It's Halloween time again this year.
After our mission in Eisengrad, the Special Steel Squad is now visiting a place called Harz. This is the hometown of Quedlinburg, Wernigerode and Goslar.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Happy Halloween! Happy Halloween too, uncles and aunts!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: This town of Harz is amazing. Everyone is dressed up, adults and children alike. And they gave me so much candy just for saying hello!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Harz is a town full of dreams. Everyone always wants to make someone happy. I'm sure you'll get more dream candy than you can hold after a round around town.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You can get that much? I've heard rumours about this town since I was little, but it really is a dream town...!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Well, this is just the beginning of what you think is a really dreamy town - have you ever seen Dream Magic, Shanghai?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Not at all! But I know a bit about it from reading about it, it's magic only in Harz and it's magic that delivers dreams, right?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes. You're not wrong. It's nothing like the magic that is commonly known. I'm sure you'll be delighted.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I can't stop being excited when you say it like that - you can use it, can't you, Wernigerode? Please, let me have it!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'd want to - but I'm going to perform in the Dream Magic Show later and I want to surprise you, Shanghai, so until then it's a secret.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Only a handful of Harz magi get to perform in the Halloween Dream Magic Show. The tickets sell out quickly every year because you get to see Dream Magic at its best!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Is Wernigerode going to be on such an amazing stage?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, Wernigerode is one of the stars of Harz. So, Shanghai, let's cheer for her together later♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Sure!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: There are many other magi in Harz besides me. Dream Magic is very different from one person to another, and each one has his or her own wonderful dream to show us. Let's have a look around the town until the show starts.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Quedlinburg, would you still like me to show you around Halloween Street?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I won't miss that for the world. Afterwards, I would like to see the Dream Magic spell-artist in the square and enjoy the magic puppet show before going to the venue.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Quedlinburg's pretty greedy with her main courses.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's Halloween in Harz after all. It would be a waste if we didn't visit as much as possible. I used to get so frustrated every year when I couldn't make it all the way round.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: But how lucky I am to be back in Harz just in time for Halloween. The atmosphere, it's great.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, my heart has been pounding ever since I came back to Harz. I'm going to have a lot of fun today, and I'm going to entertain you all to the fullest.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Alright. Well, Miss Shanghai, we're off to Halloween Street for a bit of Dream Magic.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...Eh? Where did Miss Shanghai went off to?
Shanghai would have gone to see the accessory stalls over there, but I don't see her...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Don't mean to tell me she lost her way? That's really not good, that is.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's so crowded, once we get separated it's hard to rejoin again. What should we do...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Should we wait here?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: If Shanghai thinks the same thing, we won't be able to meet up with each other at all. Then Conductor should stay here...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah, that's right. I've got a great idea.
As soon as she muttered this, Wernigerode unleashes her magical powers.
A huge, glowing portrait is created above Quedlinburg's head. Perhaps this is also Dream Magic.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Eheheh, it's impromptu, but don't you think I did a good job drawing Quedlinburg's face?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Well, you're good, but I've never done such a dignified expression. I think a more joyful expression would be more like me.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: O-Oh, really? Then a smile like this?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, yes. Then stick out my tongue. Yes, it looks good. This way Shanghai will know it's me.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Alright, now to write a message in a speech bubble next to this portrait of Quedlinburg.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah, it's like a comic, it's fun♪ I'm sure Shanghai will be able to find us.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Miss Shanghai, over here～～
Whenever Quedlinburg leapt up and down, the large portrait above her head also wiggled comically.
ーーーー

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Uwaaaaah! Where did everybody goooo!? Where is, where is Shanghai aaaaaaat～～!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ugh, where is everyone...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Harz Girl
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Have you lost someone, big sis? Do you want me to help and look together?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You really want to stay with Shanghai...? Thank you so much～～!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Well, my companion is a girl called Quedlinburg...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah, that portrait is Quedlinburg! I did it, I finally found her!
ーーーー

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: EVERYOOONE～～!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh, it seems to have had an immediate effect.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Miss Shanghai!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: EVERYOOONE～～!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Welcome back, Miss Shanghai.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I enjoyed everything I saw and then I realised everyone was gone. If it wasn't for the portrait you drew in the air, I would have been in danger...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Quedlinburg
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wernigerode drew it for me instantly. It's another piece of Dream Magic.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Shanghai
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ooooh, this is dream magic. What useful and fun magic!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmmhmm, I'm glad you enjoyed it.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Wernigerode
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...By the way, Shanghai. Who is that girl that's holding your hand?
At Wernigerode's response, a little girl peeked out from behind Shanghai.
